title: (x) Geometric slab serif on Home Hardware website - ITC Lubalin Graph {Jan E}
content:
Hi, new here and trying to figure out the slab serif from Home Hardware: [http://www.homehardware.ca/index/spotlight](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013052428/http:/www.homehardware.ca/index/spotlight "http://www.homehardware.ca/index/spotlight")

The "Help is close to home" part.

Thanks.
author: kylefox

comments.content: ‘hardware’ is Lubalin Graph. ‘Home’ seems to be custom (based on Lubalin Graph).
BTW, that site crashed my Safari (several times).
Awesome, thanks! Sorry about your browser -- mine seemed to work okay...
